title: The Mummy's Kiss: 2nd Dynasty
overview: In this sequel to the erotic cult hit, reporter Elyse Lam  investigates a string of kidnappings involving sexy young women who turn into zombie love slaves. Elyse traces the crimes to a mummy that's controlled by crazed museum director Dr. Zita Furneaux . As she digs deeper into her big story, will Elyse fall victim to Dr. Zita's seductive charms?
